profile_op.desc: Manage account information used by products and services.

info.nicknameDesc: Your nickname is shared to other users using the products and services.

imageChangeModal.desc: The profile image is shown to all the users.

nicknameChangeModal.desc: The changed nickname is applied to the products and services.

passwordQuestionModal.title: Change password reset question & answer
passwordQuestionModal.desc: You can reset password using the account ID and password recovery question & answer.
passwordQuestionModal.question: Password reset question & answer
questionList: What is the name of your first pet?
What is the name of your best friend when you were a teenager?
What was the first dis you learned?
What was the first movie you watched at the cinema?
Where was your first flight to visit?
What is the title of your favorite fairy tale book?
In which city did your parents first meet?
What is the name of the beach you've been to for the first time?
What was the name of the first mountain you visited?
What is your favorite car model?

message.success: The change of password recovery question & answer is completed
message.successDesc: The password recovery question & answer has changed.
